about_the_game:
Prepare Uranus is NSFW Visual Novel, where you're taking control of a bar on the planet Uranus, in which beautiful girls work. You have to improve the economy of your bar, pay off debts to space pirates, unravel the mystery of Black Holes and make Uranus the most popular place in the galaxy!
The game is full of hand drawn sex scenes and animations, has the original soundtracks

-11 hand drawn animations for adults
-10+ high quality hand-painted adult scenes
-Storyline with 10+ characters total
-System for gaining experience and levels for characters

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content and violence (prostitution, death threats, fights, hardcore scenes with group sex, sexual assault, sex with aliens from other planets, sex with creatures from another planets, detailed images and animations of sex and genitals)  that some viewers may find offensive. All characters shown in the game are fictional and over 21 years old.

The game is full of hand drawn sex scenes and animations, has the original soundtracks

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL® compatible
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL® compatible
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® IV+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD or Nvidia with VRAM 1GB or better
